name: BBaNNaNNa
description:
You Jin Song (ysong)

*This project is made for the Newschool: Parsons, Junior year assignments in October 2019. *

BBaNNaNNa is a 2D shump game that a main protagonist, Banana, combating sugars to save his fruit friends by collecting seeds in a sugar world! Explore different sugar enemies of chocolate lions, unicorn marshmallows, gummy bear jellies, rabbit puddings, candies and lastly a tart base boss! Defeat the tart base boss to become a fruit tart with fruit friends! - forming a fruit union!

Game Controls:

  • Movement -WASD or Left Joy Stick
  • Shoot - Left Click or Square

** Right now, collecting items does not work well I will upload fixed version as soon as possible **
